casebody.data:
KALEEL BUILDERS, INC.
v.
Kent ASHBY, d/b/a Superior Exteriors; Lake Builders, Inc.; LW Corp.; Bob's Heating & Air Conditioning Company, Inc.; and Don Duffy, Architect. No. 637P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2004. Lawrence J. Goldman, Charlotte, for Kaleel Builders. Charles D. Cheney, Charlotte, for Kent Ashby, d/b/a Sup. Exteriors. Mark D. Boynton, for Lake Builder's Inc. Daniel C. Marks, for LW Corp. Marc R. Gordon, Charlotte, for Bob's Htg. & Air Conditioning. David G. Redding, for Don Duffy. Prior report: 161 N.C.App. 470 , 587 S.E.2d 470 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of December 2003 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of April 2004."
